articles.description: State-run banks are optimistic about a more lucrative performance-linked incentive (PLI) for employees and are advocating for a five-day banking week as a new coalition government takes charge. Bank unions and employee associations seek a review of the curren…
articles.content: State-run banks are hopeful of a more lucrative performance-linked incentive (PLI) for their employees as a new coalition government takes charge. They are also likely to push for a five-day banking … [+2286 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: Hero MotoCorp invests Rs 124 Cr in Ather Energy - Entrackr
articles.description: Hero MotoCorp has approved the purchase of an additional 2.2% stake in Ather Energy for about Rs 124 crore (approximately $15 million).
